author: Grizz1
title: Poll: Jeb Falls to 4%
text: Quote: Originally Posted by Camelot Citizens United will make Bush a shoe in to win the nomination. You folks just don't understand who makes such decisions in a Citizens United reality. Polls ? Really ? Bush is a bad candidate, he's got no charisma, he generates no excitement, and he's got a brand name synonymous with FAILURE. There may not be enough money to overcome that. The GOP primaries are front loaded with winner take all states, so it's not a long haul, it's a quick strike, and he's not catching fire.
